summary: This endpoint creates a new version of a secret at the specified location.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Specifies the path of the secret to read.

parameters.name: max_versions
parameters.description: The number of versions to keep per key.

parameters.name: cas_required
parameters.description: If true the key will require the cas parameter to be set on all write requests. If false, the backendâ€™s configuration will be used.
